item.title: Using Shortcodes in Hugo to Resize Images
item.description: Hugo is a powerful static site generator that offers a lot of flexibility through its templating system. One of the features that makes Hugo so versatile is the ability to create and use shortcodes. In this post, we’ll explore how to create a shortcode to resize images and use it in your content pages. Why Use Shortcodes for Image Resizing? Imagine you’re creating multiple blog posts and need to resize images to fit onto each page.
